name: Linen Tea Towel / Hand Dyed Batik / Lime / Pause
description:
When the things you use most are beautiful and well crafted, the everyday is a little more enjoyable. Just because something is useful doesn't mean it shouldn't make you smile. 

Once you use my hand dyed linen towels, you’ll never want to use anything else. Machine washable, colorfast, and unsurpassed for absorption and durability, these towels not only last forever but they get softer with use.

* Pattern: Pause
* Colorway : Lime (bright granny smith green)
* Hand Dyed Batik
* 100% linen
* Approx: 16” x 24” (40.6 cm x 61 cm)
* Hemmed on all sides with mitered corners for a clean
finish

* CARE: the fabric will withstand any temperature water
although cool is gentlest. Avoid bleach. Machine
dry low or medium.

* These towels feature my Pause pattern. I dyed fabric a light, fresh green, then applied wax in the pause pattern. The fabric was dyed a second time, and the wax blocked the dye to create the two color pattern. Because of the hand-dyeing process, these towels have beautiful variations of shade which are not obtainable using commercial processes.

* Please note that pattern placement will vary. Each piece
will be slightly different. This is expected and
desirable. When you order, you will receive a similar
piece, not necessarily the exact piece shown.

*** All 5 o’clock crows products are designed and created in my smoke free Louisiana studio.

*** Much effort has been put into accurately describing and photographing this product using natural light, but please note that color representation alters depending on individual monitor settings.

**Don't see exactly what you like? I'm always happy to create a custom order. Please don't hesitate to contact me! Production time is 1-2 weeks on items that are sewn and 3-4 weeks on items that are dyed and sewn.

dry low or medium.

Because of the hand-dyeing process, these towels have beautiful variations of shade which are not obtainable using commercial processes.

will be slightly different. This is expected and

name: Linen Tea Towel / Hand Dyed Batik / Perse / Otto
description:
When the things you use most are beautiful and well crafted, the everyday is a little more enjoyable. Just because something is useful doesn't mean it shouldn't make you smile.

Once you use my hand dyed linen towels, you’ll never want to use anything else. Machine washable, colorfast, and unsurpassed for absorption and durability, these towels not only last forever but they get softer with use.

* Pattern: Otto
* Colorway : Perse
* Hand Dyed Batik
* 100% linen
* Approx: 16” x 24” (40.6 cm x 61 cm)
* Hemmed on all sides with mitered corners for a clean
finish
* CARE: the fabric will withstand any temperature water
although cool is gentlest. Avoid bleach. Machine
dry low or medium.

* These towels feature my Otto pattern. Linen fabric was first dyed a beautiful lavender, and then stamped with wax to create the pattern. The fabric was then dyed a rich eggplant purple; the unwaxed areas absorb the darker dye while the waxed areas remain lavender. Dyeing the fabric multiple times creates a depth and richness of color which is unique to hand dyeing.

* Please note that pattern placement will vary. Each piece
will be slightly different. This is expected and
desirable. When you order, you will receive a similar
piece, not necessarily the exact piece shown.

*** All 5 o’clock crows products are designed and created in my smoke free Louisiana studio.

*** Much effort has been put into accurately describing and photographing this product using natural light, but please note that color representation alters depending on individual monitor settings.

**Don't see exactly what you like? I'm always happy to create a custom order. Please don't hesitate to contact me! Production time is 1-2 weeks on items that are sewn and 3-4 weeks on items that are dyed and sewn.
